en.today: The energy could feel emotional and heavy this morning, dear Aries, as the Cancer moon forms a tense square with Chiron. Try to make space for everyone to process their feelings, but don't allow others to guilt trip you. The atmosphere hits a turning point once afternoon sets in, and Luna forms sweet connections with Chiron, Uranus, Saturn, Mars, Venus, Rx, Mercury Rx, and the nodes of fate. This cosmic climate puts you in a private yet nurturing mood, offering the perfect ambiance for a cozy Saturday at home with those you adore most. You'll feel like exploring and having fun once the moon enters Leo later tonight.

en.today: Invite in stillness to find healing and peace, dear Leo, as the Cancer moon and Chiron align this morning. You could come to discover that much in your life needs changing as the stars align to help you break unhelpful cycles. Luckily, sweet connections between Luna, Uranus, Saturn, Mars, Venus Rx, Mercury Rx, and the nodes of fate offer motivation. With each step taken in the right direction, you will feel increasingly powerful and passionate about the future. Your star rises later tonight when the moon enters your sign, inviting you to take up space while pushing for personal growth.
